message: Bob, I'm offering you my product for $13,000. This is a great deal for a product worth so much.  Let me know what you think!
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9,000. Can you meet me at that price?
Bob, I appreciate your interest in the product, but $9,000 is a bit too low for me. How about we meet in the middle at $11,000? I think that's a fair price for both of us.
I'm not sure I can go up to $11,000. How about we meet at $9,500? I'm willing to compromise, but I really want to stay under $10,000.
Bob, I understand your position.  $9,500 is still a bit low for me, but I'm willing to come down to $10,500. Let's see if we can reach an agreement here.
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but $10,500 is still a bit too high for me. I'm willing to meet you in the middle, but I can only go up to $10,000. Can we agree on that price?
